title: Avenge the Hag Survivors
content:
Avenge the Hag Survivors Type Quest Act Act 3 Location Baldur's Gate Reward Fey Semblance Amulet

Avenge the Hag Survivors

Avenge the Hag Survivors is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Avenge the Hag Survivors can be acquired during Act 3. This quest can be obtained when you reach Baldur's Gate. All Baldur's Gate quests will be grouped together in your quest journal. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earn more loot and experie
